name: Pixel Wolf Survival Simulator
description:
Welcome to a dangerous craft forest. You are a cute cubical wolf, who explores pixel frozen forest full of dangers, hunts prey to get meal and battles against other pixel desert predators! Let’s know what is it like to be a pixel wolf exploring arctic forest – the real taiga - hunting and chasing its prey with Pixel Wolf Survival Simulator! Try this ultimate wolf simulator and feel like a powerful predator – the real master of pixel wilderness! Let’s start a hunt – and let no one to run out of your chase! Earn experience and level up your wolf! Buy power-ups and customize your wolf as you want!
Start a survival adventure as a cute pixel wolf - run fast and hunt as many animals as possible! Become the biggest predator of the cubed arctic world and chase down small animals to made them your next meal! Do your best to survive on this frozen, cruel and wild world, full of dangers and predators ready to attack! Do you like animal games? Try Pixel Wolf Survival Simulator - great app for all animal simulator fans!
Pixel Wolf Survival Simulator features:
Cute cubical wolf as the main character
Opportunity to make a pack of wolves
Various pixel animals as your prey
Fantastic frozen world to explore
Some ways to update your wolf
Play Pixel Wolf Survival Simulator and fight against other animals! Explore this cute arctic cubical world as a craft wolf, but don’t relax - it might be even more unpredictable than you can imagine! Survive as long as you can, chase your prey mercilessly, fight with other wolves or make them part of your pack! Mate with females and breed pups! Enjoy Pixel Wolf Survival Simulator right now!
